Welcome¶

Welcome to Python Flight Data Processing’s documentation! This project eases the process of plotting the flight data of BETTII.

The three main classes that were created for this project are:

  • Field, describes a field
  • DataSet, implements the process of reading a list of fields from a folder or a list of folders
  • Estimator, estimates the attitude using the sensors data and has methods to plot the results

Another common class is Quat, that provides easy manipulation of quaternion objects. This project also relies heavily on the matplotlib for the plots and on the pandas modules, as it uses the pandas.DataFrame data structure to store the time-series information.
